v8:item.v8:content: Documents that are received during data synchronization with the other application, cannot be posted automatically. We recommend that you open the document and solve any issues that prevent posting
Unposted documents context menu ignoring group
Unposted documents context menu ignoring group
Reason why document cannot be posted
The infobase or application from which the document is received
The document cannot be posted automatically by the following reason

Objects that are received during data synchronization with the other application, cannot be written properly because one or several attributes are filled incorrectly. We recommend that you open the catalog item and fill these attributes.
Blank attributes context menu ignoring group
Blank attributes context menu ignoring group
The reason why the data cannot be written correctly
The infobase or application from which data is received
Data item cannot be written by the following reason
The same data was changed in both applications, and as the result two versions of a catalog item (document) were created and conflict occurred that was resolved automatically.
Coordination with context menu splitter group
Catalog item (document) which there is a conflict
Data is received from other application
The infobase or application from which the version is received
Status of version that is received from other application

During data synchronization some data item were declined due to the data import prohibition date is set. As the result declined versions of catalog items (documents) occurred. To accept version regardless of any prohibitions, use the "Accept version" command.
Declined by date context menu ignoring group
Declined by date context menu ignoring group
Items declined due to prohibition date
Data is received from other application
The infobase or application from which the version is received
Data items were declined due to prohibition

Settings.QueryText: SELECT ALLOWED DataExchangeResults.ProblematicObjects AS Ref, CASE WHEN DataExchangeResults.DeletionMark THEN 2 ELSE 0 END AS DeletionMark, DataExchangeResults.DocumentNumber AS DocumentNumber, DataExchangeResults.DocumentDate AS DocumentDate, DataExchangeResults.InfobaseNode, DataExchangeResults.OccurrenceDate, DataExchangeResults.Reason, DataExchangeResults.Skipped, VALUETYPE(DataExchangeResults.ProblematicObjects) AS TypeString FROM InformationRegister.DataExchangeResults AS DataExchangeResults WHERE DataExchangeResults.ProblemType = VALUE(Enum.DataExchangeProblemTypes.UnpostedDocument)

SELECT ALLOWED DataExchangeResults.ProblematicObjects As Ref, CASE WHEN DataExchangeResults.DeletionMark THEN 4 ELSE 3 END AS DeletionMark, DataExchangeResults.InfobaseNode, DataExchangeResults.OccurrenceDate, DataExchangeResults.Reason, DataExchangeResults.Skipped, VALUETYPE(DataExchangeResults.ProblematicObjects) AS TypeString FROM InformationRegister.DataExchangeResults AS DataExchangeResults WHERE DataExchangeResults.ProblemType = VALUE(Enum.DataExchangeProblemTypes.BlankAttributes)

SELECT ALLOWED OtherApplicationVersion.VersionDate AS Date, OtherApplicationVersion.Object AS Ref, VALUETYPE(OtherApplicationVersion.Object) AS TypeString, ThisApplicationVersion.VersionNumber AS ThisVersionNumber, OtherApplicationVersion.VersionNumber AS OtherVersionNumber, OtherApplicationVersion.VersionAuthor AS OtherVersionAuthor, CASE WHEN OtherApplicationVersion.ObjectVersionType = VALUE(Enum.ObjectVersionTypes.DataAcceptedDuringConflict) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OtherVersionAccepted, OtherApplicationVersion.VersionIgnored AS VersionIgnored FROM InformationRegister.ObjectVersions AS OtherApplicationVersion LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.ObjectVersions AS ThisApplicationVersion ON OtherApplicationVersion.Object = ThisApplicationVersion.Object AND (OtherApplicationVersion.VersionNumber = ThisApplicationVersion.VersionNumber + 1) WHERE Not(OtherApplicationVersion.ObjectVersionType <> VALUE(Enum.ObjectVersionTypes.DataAcceptedDuringConflict) AND OtherApplicationVersion.ObjectVersionType <> VALUE(Enum.ObjectVersionTypes.DataNotAcceptedDuringConflict))

SELECT ALLOWED UnacceptedVersion.VersionDate AS Date, UnacceptedVersion.Object AS Ref, UnacceptedVersion.Comment AS ProhibitionReason, CASE WHEN UnacceptedVersion.ObjectVersionType = VALUE(Enum.ObjectVersionTypes.DataDeclinedByEditProhibitionDateExistsInInfobase) THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS NewObject, ISNULL(UnacceptedVersion.VersionNumber, 0) AS OtherVersionNumber, UnacceptedVersion.VersionAuthor AS OtherVersionAuthor, ISNULL(CurrentVersion.VersionNumber, 0) AS ThisVersionNumber, VALUETYPE(UnacceptedVersion.Object) AS TypeString, UnacceptedVersion.VersionIgnored FROM InformationRegister.ObjectVersions AS UnacceptedVersion LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.ObjectVersions AS CurrentVersion ON UnacceptedVersion.Object = CurrentVersion.Object AND (UnacceptedVersion.VersionNumber = CurrentVersion.VersionNumber + 1) WHERE Not(UnacceptedVersion.ObjectVersionType <> VALUE(Enum.ObjectVersionTypes.DataDeclinedByEditProhibitionDateExistsInInfobase) AND UnacceptedVersion.ObjectVersionType <> VALUE(Enum.ObjectVersionTypes.DataDeclinedByEditProhibitionDateNotExistInInfobase))

v8:item.v8:content: Show version created in this infobase
Open version created in this infobase
Show differences between data versions in this application and the other application
Review and confirm the result of the automatic conflict resolution.
Ignore items that are declined due to prohibition date
Remove Reviewed attribute for the selected conflict
Cancel ignoring of data items that are declined due to prohibited date
Accept version regardless of any data import prohibitions
Show version received from other infobase
Open version that is received from the other infobase
Review and change the conflict resolution result on the opposite one.
